column4: if anyone is able to explain why suddnely i get these "declare -x" things when i login I would appreciate the help  http://img412.imageshack.us/my.php?image=untitledjp7.jpg
that's the sort of output that the 'export' command gives without any arguments. do you have "export" in a .bashrc, .bash_profile, .profile, or similar file somewhere?
thats the thing that confuses me. i removed eerything in my home and in my ~root as well
you could create a new user and see if it's effected. if it is, it might be in /etc/ somewhere. /etc/profile or similar
